An authorization memo has been placed on the wireless number(s) below. The associated person(s) can now call our Customer Care department at 1-888-764-3771 to complete the transfer of responsibility.
XXX-XXX-XXXX - (NAME)
Interaction ID# (I--------)
In order to be fully prepared and successfully complete the transfer, please note the information below which may be helpful:

b.As the user(s) above will no longer be eligible for corporate pricing, they will be required to change to an in-market consumer price plan upon completion of the transfer and as such, the line may be subject to credit recovery fees (ex. Device/Renewal/Activation credit recovery).
c.If you require additional information on current in-market price plans, please feel free to contact us at <<1-888-764-3771 (Customer Care) OR for IDV 1-844-776-4377 RogersBusinessCare@rci.rogers.com.
d.Your company will still be responsible for charges and usage up until user takes responsibility of the number.
e.Porting out is not considered a Transfer of Responsibility and is subject to credit recovery fees of <$XXX>.
f.The wireless number can only be transferred to personal account & cannot replace an existing Rogers wireless number (Internal port).
